meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing a six-membered ring with four carbon atoms, one oxygen atom, and one nitrogen atom.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the properties of oxazines in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacy ordered a new batch of oxazines for research purposes.
meanings.sent3: The oxazines in the chemical reaction decided to throw a party.
meanings.sent4: The structure of oxazines in the compound resembled a tiny universe.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the vibrant colors of oxazines were mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: The shelves in the lab were filled with various oxazines.
meanings.sent2: She bought a set of oxazines to add to her collection.
meanings.sent3: The oxazines on the bookshelf seemed to be whispering to each other.
meanings.sent4: The garden bloomed with oxazines, creating a colorful display.
meanings.sent5: The artist used different shades of oxazines in the painting to create depth.
